MySQLå­˜å‚¨è¿‡ç¨‹ç¤ºä¾‹ DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS `proc_appunionweight`;DELIMITER $$CREATE PROCEDURE `proc_appunionweight`(v_apitype VARCHAR(50))BEGIN SELECT CASE WHEN apptypeid <> '' AND appqid <> '' AND slotid <> '' THEN CONCAT_WS('_',apptypeid,appqid,slotid) WHEN apptypeid <> '' AND appqid = '' AND slotid <> '' THEN CONCAT_WS('_',apptypeid,slotid) WHEN apptypeid = '' AND appqid = '' AND slotid <> '' THEN slotid END AS configtypeid, apptypeid, appver AS configversion, os, weightver AS version, uniontype AS configname, weight AS value, packagepath, issdk FROM adplatform_app_slotid WHERE enable = 'Y' AND enableweight='Y' AND FIND_IN_SET(v_apitype,apitype) ORDER BY configtypeid DESC,weightver DESC; END $$DELIMITER ; å¸¦å…¥å‚å’Œè¿”å›å€¼ DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS `proc_editbiddinginfo`;DELIMITER $$CREATE PROCEDURE `proc_editbiddinginfo`(varplatform varchar(20),varqid VARCHAR(50),varlocationtype VARCHAR(50),varcpm VARCHAR(20), varsourcetype VARCHAR(50),varimpression VARCHAR(20),varclick VARCHAR(20),varincome VARCHAR(20),varctr VARCHAR(20),varcpc VARCHAR(20))BEGIN DECLARE sp_error INT DEFAULT 0; DECLARE result INT DEFAULT 0; DECLARE CONTINUE HANDLER FOR SQLEXCEPTION SET sp_error=1; IF varplatform = 'app' THEN UPDATE adver_position_cpm_for_bid_by_app SET cpm = varcpm,sourcetype=varsourcetype,impression=varimpression,click=varclick,income=varincome,ctr=varctr,cpc=varcpc WHERE qid = varqid AND locationtype = varlocationtype; SET result = 1; ELSEIF varplatform = 'h5' THEN IF varqid = 'other' THEN UPDATE adver_position_cpm_for_bid_fake SET cpm = varcpm,sourcetype=varsourcetype,impression=varimpression,click=varclick,income=varincome,ctr=varctr,cpc=varcpc WHERE qid = varqid AND locationtype = varlocationtype; ELSE UPDATE adver_position_cpm_for_bid_qid SET cpm = varcpm,sourcetype=varsourcetype,impression=varimpression,click=varclick,income=varincome,ctr=varctr,cpc=varcpc WHERE qid = varqid AND locationtype = varlocationtype; END IF; SET result = 1; ELSEIF varplatform = 'pc' THEN UPDATE adver_position_cpm_for_bid_fake SET cpm = varcpm,sourcetype=varsourcetype,impression=varimpression,click=varclick,income=varincome,ctr=varctr,cpc=varcpc WHERE qid = varqid AND locationtype = varlocationtype; SET result = 1; END IF; IF sp_error=1 THEN SELECT sp_error; ROLLBACK; ELSE SELECT result; COMMIT; END IF;END $$DELIMITER ;
